effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Any ally within 2 squares of the iron priest gains an edge on their next strike. If any target lost a Recovery, any affected ally has a double edge instead.

items.name: Iron Banner
items.target: Each war dog in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect:
For every 2 Malice spent, each target gains one of the following effects until the start of the iron priest's next turn.
- The target has damage immunity 2.
- The target's strikes deal an extra 3 holy damage.
- The target has a +3 bonus to speed.
The Director gains 1 Malice whenever an ally within 3 squares of the iron priest obtains a tier 3 outcome on a power roll.
